category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_REQDaily_file_type_xsl_names
preference.preference_description: Specifies the XSL files and associated mode of import (separated the ':' character) to be used to convert International Material Data System (IMDS) REQ Daily XML files into TC-XML files.
